alert.note: Alert for Gove (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 11:12PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gove County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1111 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles north of Healy, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Gove County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
